Sentence.sentence: Did you hear that Anna needs to stay in bed for 4 weeks?
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The injury will confine Anna to bed for quite a while
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Arranging a bed for a patient.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And a 2015 study from the University of California, Berkeley, found that teens who go to bed late are more likely to gain weight over a five-year period.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力  Section B

Sentence.sentence: But surely everyone reading this has had times when you lie in bed for hours, unable to fall asleep because your brain is thinking about work.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: If after work you lie around on your bed and get irritated by political commentary on your phone or get stressed thinking about decisions about how to renovate your home, your brain has not received a break from high mental arousal states.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: If you lie in bed for eight hours, you may have rested, but you can still feel exhausted the next day.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Mothers who slept in the same room as their infants, whether in the same bed or just the same room, had poorer sleep than mothers whose babies slept elsewhere in the house: They woke up more frequently, were awake approximately 20 minutes longer per night
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: right now, to reduce the risk of sudden infant death syndrome, the American Academy of Pediatrics recommends that mothers not sleep in the same bed as their babies, but sleep in the same room.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Still, if late sleepers want to lose a few pounds, they can go to bed earlier than they usually do, thereby reducing their chances of taking snacks before bedtime.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力  Section B

Sentence.sentence: The later one goes to bed, the more calories one records the next day.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力  Section B

Sentence.sentence: Three-quarters of the world's flamingos fly over from other salt lakes in the Rift Valley and nest on salt-crystal islands that appear when the water is at a specific level一too high and the birds can't build their nests, too low and predators can move bri
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

means: big end down 上小下大钢锭模

word_mean: 睡时支持身体的床或榻
铺在地面上有一定厚度经过紧实刮平的型砂层。用于地坑卧模造型或明浇铸铁芯骨等。
机床上用于支承和连接若干部件，并带有导轨的基础零件。

Sentence.sentence: A warm drink of milk before bed has long been the best choice for those wanting a good night's sleep.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: According to a new survey (调查) by the national sleep foundation, 51% of kids aged 10 to 18 go to bed at 10 pm or later on school nights, even though they have to get up early.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Across Britain, burnt toast will be served to mothers in bed this morning as older sons and daughters rush to deliver their supermarket bunches of flowers.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Anxiously I went to bed dreaming about what I would find at the top of this magical mountain.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: But when it's time for bed, you can hardly fall asleep.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 完形填空 B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Fortunately, I didn't get any channels showing all-night movies or I would never have gotten to bed.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: He made sure I made my bed and did my homework.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: I'd like to book a room with a double bed.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: I'm always tired but when I go to bed I can't sleep.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 单项选择 情景对话 原文

Sentence.sentence: Instead, we had a pop-up camper with comfortable beds and an air conditioner.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Like the two little girls growing up at the White House, we made our own beds no one left the house until that was doneand picked up after ourselves.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Milk is also sugar-free and additive-free with nutritionists recommending skimmed milk as the best choice before bed as it is the least fattening.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: She grew up in one of jamaica's toughest inner-city communities known as Waterhouse, where she lived in a one-room apartment, sleeping four in a bed with her mother and two brothers.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: She should make her bed, do her homework and drink no alcohol.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 答案 选项

Sentence.sentence: Sorry, we have no rooms like that now, but we have a room with a single bed.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Are we studying that text and trying to respond in a way that fulfils the requirement of a given course? Reading it simply for pleasure? Skimming it for information? Ways of reading on a train or in bed are likely to differ considerably from reading in a seminar room.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

jx.jx_en_mean: (archaic)(of a woman) give birth to a child

stay in bed because of illness

lj.lj_ls: “以色列人在&I{[秘密]} 工作方面是有经验的，但重要的是政府不要在这方面与他们搅在一起” (&b{鲍勃·伍德沃德})

jx.jx_cn_mean: 上床，同床：与…发生性关系

entry.def: A bed is a piece of furniture that you lie on when you sleep.

example.ex: She went into her bedroom and lay down on the bed...
We finally went to bed at about 4am...
example.tran: 我们最后大概是凌晨4点上的床。

entry.def: If a place such as a hospital or a hotel has a particular number of beds, it is able to hold that number of patients or guests.
A bed in a garden or park is an area of ground that has been specially prepared so that plants can be grown in it.

example.ex: The geraniums in the flower bed looked bedraggled from the heavy rain.
example.tran: 花坛里的天竺葵被大雨浇得七零八落。
种有草莓和大黄的苗圃

entry.def: A bed of shellfish or plants is an area in the sea or in a lake where a particular type of shellfish or plant is found in large quantities.
entry.tran: （海洋或湖泊中某种贝类和植物密集分布的）场，层，带

example.ex: Fishermen fear valuable oyster and mussel beds could be decimated...
example.tran: 渔民们害怕宝贵的牡蛎和贻贝层会被破坏。

example.ex: The whole lake was rimmed with thick beds of reeds.
example.tran: 整片湖都被密密层层的芦苇围了起来。

entry.def: The sea bed or a river bed is the ground at the bottom of the sea or of a river.

example.ex: For three weeks a big operation went on to recover the wreckage from the sea bed.
example.tran: 打捞海底残骸这一浩大工程持续了三周。

example.ex: ...the bare bed of a dry stream.

entry.def: A bed of rock is a layer of rock that is found within a larger area of rock.

example.ex: Between the white limestone and the greyish pink limestone is a thin bed of clay.
example.tran: 在白色石灰石和粉灰色石灰石之间是一层薄薄的黏土。

entry.def: If a recipe or a menu says that something is served on a bed of a food such as rice or vegetables, it means it is served on a layer of that food.

example.ex: Heat the curry thoroughly and serve it on a bed of rice.
example.tran: 把咖喱热透后浇在米饭上。

entry.def: To get someone into bed means to persuade them to have sex with you.
entry.tran: 把…搞上床；诱使…发生性关系

entry.def: To go to bed with someone means to have sex with them.
If you say that someone is in bed with someone else, you mean that they are having sex in bed.
If you say that someone is good in bed, you mean that they are a skilful lover.
entry.tran: 在做爱方面；就床上功夫而言

entry.def: If you say that someone has made their bed and must lie in it, you mean that since they have chosen to do a particular thing, they must now accept the unpleasant results of their action.
When you make the bed, you neatly arrange the sheets and covers of a bed so that it is ready to sleep in.
If you say that someone got out of bed on the wrong side, you mean that they have been bad-tempered ever since they woke up that morning.

means.word_mean: 1. a piece of furniture that provides a place to sleep;

sentences.sentence: "he sat on the edge of the bed"
"the room had only a bed and chair"

means.word_mean: 2. a plot of ground in which plants are growing;

sentences.sentence: "the gardener planted a bed of roses"

means.word_mean: 3. a depression forming the ground under a body of water;

sentences.sentence: "he searched for treasure on the ocean bed"

means.word_mean: 4. (geology) a stratum of rock (especially sedimentary rock);
5. a stratum of ore or coal thick enough to be mined with profit;
6. single thickness of usually some homogeneous substance;

sentences.sentence: "slices of hard-boiled egg on a bed of spinach"

means.word_mean: 7. the flat surface of a printing press on which the type form is laid in the last stage of producing a newspaper or magazine or book etc.
8. a foundation of earth or rock supporting a road or railroad track;

sentences.sentence: "The inn keeper could bed all the new arrivals"

means.word_mean: 2. place (plants) in a prepared bed of soil

sentences.sentence: "The children were bedded at ten o'clock"
"This student sleeps with everyone in her dorm"
"Were you ever intimate with this man?"

means.word_mean: 5. go to bed in order to sleep;

sentences.sentence: "He turns out at the crack of dawn"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bed, bedd (noun), beddian (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch bed and German Bett

sentences.en: ...the bare bed of a dry stream.

sentences.cn: 河水把河床里的石头冲得翻滚而下.
sentences.en: A river rolls the stones along its bed.

sentences.cn: 沉积相主要有河床相 、 河漫滩相、浅海相 、 河口湾相、湖沼相 、 滨海相和陆相坡积洪积风化红土等7种类型,它们的分布与古河谷的形成演化和海平面的变化密切相关.
sentences.en: Sedimentary facies include river bed , alluvial flat, neritic , river mouth and limnetic, littoral, weathered continental drift bed and flood deposit facies.

sentences.cn: 河床已干枯宽阔的运河已变得狭长.
sentences.en: The bed has become drought and its course narrow.

sentences.cn: 它们是独居动物, 通常自己进食, 沿河床寻找食物.
sentences.en: They are solitary creatures, usually feeding on their own, searching for prey on the river bed.

sentences.cn: 在水中可以看到建在地上河床上的铁路.
sentences.en: A railroad, on its raised bed, can be seen amidst the water.

sentences.cn: 现在仍然有人在河床上寻找黄金.
sentences.en: There are still people searching for gold on the bed of the river.

sentences.cn: 浑河西部河床海拔最低, 仅为1050米.
sentences.en: River bed in the western lowest elevation, is only 1050 meters.

sentences.cn: 那位农学家建议在干涸的河床上种水稻.
sentences.en: The agronomist suggested growing rice on the dried river bed.

sentences.cn: 像新墨西哥或亚利桑那州一条干枯的河床.
sentences.en: Like a dry river bed in New Mexico or Arizona.

sentences.cn: 最初的河床质取样器有三种类型.
sentences.en: Bed material samplers, as first developed , may be divided into three types.

sentences.cn: 在蜿蜒的水下水道的流动和河床演化的数值模拟.
sentences.en: Numerical modeling of flow and bed evolution in meandering submarine channels.

sentences.cn: 在许多情况下, 这种河床冲刷是有利的.
sentences.en: In many instances, such bed degradation is beneficial.

sentences.cn: 只有当河流溢出新河床时,河水现在才会奔跑得如此凶猛.
sentences.en: Now the water ran strongly only when the river overflowed its new bed.

sentences.cn: 由于水库拦截大量泥沙,“清水”下泄将使水库下游河床产生长距离、长时段的冲刷与河床调整,可能影响下游航道.
sentences.en: The bed erosion may bring a negative effect of deteriorate the navigation chanel.

sentences.cn: 建坝后水库 下泄 水流挟带的床沙质含沙量减少,坝下游河床出现冲刷.
sentences.en: The released flow from reservoirs carries less sediment load of bed material than pre ? dam periods.

sentences.cn: 天然河流修建水库后, 下游河道发生的最大变化就是河床冲刷粗化.
sentences.en: Results after the reservoirs building, the maximum variation was scouring armoring for river bed downstream reservoir.

sentences.cn: 弹弓向外飞去,碰到了50米外的河床.
sentences.en: The arch flares out to meet the sea bed at 50 metres.

sentences.cn: 小溪潺潺流过多石的河床.
sentences.en: The brook warbled over its rocky bed.

sentences.cn: 多数河流河床较深, 利于通航 、 灌溉 、 养殖及发电.
sentences.en: Most of the river bed deeper, which will help navigation, irrigation, farming and power generation.

sentences.cn: 流速增大时,沙纹、沙垄消失,河床变平.
sentences.en: At some higher velocity the ripples or dunes disappear and the bed becomes flat.

sentences.cn: 在稍高一些的流速时,个别的颗粒沿着河床间歇地滚动和滑动.
sentences.en: At some higher velocity individual grains will roll and slide intermittently along the bed.

sentences.cn: 在那个干枯的河床旁,他们打算干什么?
sentences.en: What did they plan to do by that dry bed?

sentences.cn: 一辆古式的公共汽车停在一条干涸了的河床旁边.
sentences.en: An ancient bus stopped by a dry river bed.

sentences.cn: 探矿者淘选从河床中挖出的少量含金泥砂和沙砾.
sentences.en: The prospector panned off bits of sand and gravel scooped from the bed of a stream.

sentences.cn: 在清水水流河床冲刷率的实验研究基础上,本文进一步研究了挟沙水流来沙率对冲刷率的影响.
sentences.en: The rate of channel bed scour in sediment laden flows are experimentally studied.

sentences.cn: 在那个干涸的河床旁他们打算干什么?
sentences.en: What did they plan to do by the dry bed?

sentences.cn: 在一条河床上可能有一个陡峭的悬崖.
sentences.en: There may be a deep cliff in the bed of a stream.

sentences.cn: 枯竭的河床觉得无需向丰水期表示谢意.
sentences.en: The dry river – bed finds no thanks for its past.

sentences.cn: 河床干涸了.
sentences.en: The river bed is dry.

sentences.cn: 由于煤层发育、软地层等原因使压裂技术尚未突破.
sentences.en: Hydraulic fracturing has been unsuccessful because of coal bed and soft formation in Baolang Oilfield.

sentences.cn: 随着地层时差的不同和扩径量的不同,双发双收声系的补偿能力也不同.
sentences.en: The compensated ability varies with the difference of bed slowness and changes of hole diameter.

sentences.cn: 南京附近的古砾石层是该地区新生代重要地层之一.
sentences.en: Paleogravel bed around Nanjing city is one of primary Cenozoic strata in Nanjing area.

sentences.cn: 本月发表的一份关于睡眠和营养的报告发现，那些一贯在晚上11点之前上床睡觉的人摄入的卡路里较少，所吃的健康食品较多。
sentences.en: A report on sleep and nutrition released this month found that people who consistently went to bed earlier than 11 p.m. took in fewer calories and ate more healthy food.
sentences.from: 17年12月六级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 相比之下，那些在晚上11点到凌晨3点之间上床睡觉的“夜猫子”往往会比早起的人们摄入更多的咖啡、酒精、精制糖和加工肉类。
sentences.en: In contrast，“night owls” who go to bed between 11 p.m. and 3 a.m. tend to consume more coffee, alcohol, refined sugars and processed meats than early risers.
sentences.from: 17年12月六级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 上床之前,把烦恼事 、 思绪或问题写下来.
sentences.en: Write down any worries, thoughts or questions before bed.

sentences.cn: 我很乐意爬上床躲起来.
sentences.en: I was glad to climb into the sanctuary of my bed.

sentences.cn: 他颤抖着爬上床.
sentences.en: He crept shivering into bed.

sentences.cn: 汤米,到上床睡觉的时间了.
sentences.en: It's time for bed, Tommy.

sentences.cn: 约翰: 9点. 我今晚必须在10点半前上床睡觉.
sentences.en: John: At nine o'clock. I must go to bed before half past ten tonight.

sentences.cn: 现在. 我帮你把卡舍尔抱上床.
sentences.en: Here. I'll help you put Cathal to bed.

sentences.cn: 我上床睡觉前看半小时报纸.
sentences.en: I read the newspaper for half an hour before I went to bed.
sentences.from: 英汉 - 翻译样例 - 口语

sentences.cn: 如果你感到不舒服, 就上床躺一会.
sentences.en: If you feel unwell, go and lie down on the bed for a bit.

sentences.cn: 我正要上床睡觉时听到了敲门声.
sentences.en: I am about to go to bed when I hear a rap at the door.

sentences.cn: 疲惫不堪的孩子们很快上床睡觉了.
sentences.en: The exhausted children went to bed quickly.

sentences.cn: 他们搅得乱七八糟, 然后就上床休息去了! 我希望他们见鬼去!
sentences.en: They make a mess, then go to rest in bed! I with they'd drop dead!

sentences.cn: 我每天晚上大约十点半上床睡觉.
sentences.en: I the bed about ten thirty every day.

sentences.cn: 上床,我一会就上来安顿你睡觉.
sentences.en: Get into the bed and I'll be up in a moment to tuck you in.

sentences.cn: 昨天晚上我一做完作业就上床睡觉了.
sentences.en: I went to bed as soon as I finished my homework last night.

sentences.cn: 我通常再快到午夜的时候才上床睡觉,早上5点钟起床.
sentences.en: I usually go to bed close to midnight and I am up by 5:00 am.

sentences.cn: 你得给你的小女孩洗个澡,然后让她上床睡觉.
sentences.en: You have your little girl to bath and put to bed.

sentences.cn: 你说的上床, 是动词还是名词, 是广意还是狭义的?
sentences.en: You said bed, is a verb or noun, is a narrow or broad sense?

sentences.cn: 直到他父亲晚上11点回到家,他才上床睡觉.
sentences.en: He didn't go to bed until his father came back home at 11 o'clock.

sentences.cn: 假使你现在就上床睡觉, 我就念个睡前故事给你听.
sentences.en: If you go to bed now, I've read you a bedtime story.

sentences.cn: 我夜里睡得很不好, 上床相当早, 可是不知为什么睡不着.
sentences.en: I had a bad night; I went to bed early enough, but for some reason I couldn't get off to sleep.

sentences.cn: 我11:30上床睡觉,一会就会入睡.
sentences.en: I get into bed at about 11:30 and go right off to sleep.

sentences.cn: 养成上床前提前几个小时洗脸的习惯.
sentences.en: Make a habit of washing your face a few hours before bed.

sentences.cn: 所以你得早点上床,好好睡一觉.
sentences.en: So you need to go to bed early and get a good night's sleep.

sentences.cn: 如果你明早6点钟走, 你最好现在就上床.
sentences.en: If you leave at 6 o'clock tomorrow morning, you'd better get to bed now.

sentences.cn: 我们去到我的房间,一起爬上床.
sentences.en: We went to my room and clambered into bed together.

sentences.cn: 她直到11点才上床睡觉.
sentences.en: She didn't go to bed until eleven o'clock.

sentences.cn: 他气鼓鼓地在就寝的时间爬上床, 接着他妻子也上了床.
sentences.en: He went stumping up to bed at his usual time, followed presently by his wife.

sentences.cn: 嵌塞时注意用小块填料分层分段嵌实.防止出现空气泡.
sentences.en: Fill it bed to bed with bit, in order to Prevent air bladder appear.

Sentence.sentence: They want to go to bed on regular hours.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But their beds were provided by private individuals, rather than a hotel chain
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: She'd wake up early, turn on her laptop and chat on Internet dating sites and instant-messaging programs – leaving her bed for only brief intervals.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He drove in, parked and hurried home to go to bed.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: One of the greatest heartbreaks for fire fighters occurs when they fail to rescue a child from a burning building because the child, frightened by smoke and noise, hides under a bed or in a closet and is later found dead.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I just go to bed because it's so late and I'm tired.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: That people often experience trouble sleeping in a different bed in unfamiliar surroundings is a phenomenon known as the "first-night" effect.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C
